resources.string: In 2017, which player became the leading run scorer of all tie in women\'s ODI cricket?
Let`s play and win up to 1000,000 $

This game is a simulation of one of the famous TV shows in the world (The Millionaire). We hope that you like this simulation in all its details except for the million dollars. We are a group of bankrupts... I mean programmers. We made this game as one of the lessons of the chance course. I hope you enjoy with us.
This means that you will remain broke for the rest of your life
Now you can call yourself a millionaire
